DataElement.preferredName: Person Clinical Study Assignment Follow-up Month Duration
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the number of months of follow-up for person by assignment on a clinical study, research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related the follow-up person by assignment on a clinical study, research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects.

Property.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :Assignment; an undertaking that you have been assigned to do.:The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.

The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the number of months (999.9) during which an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The period of time during which something continues.
